{{lc|std::formatter}} 的特化，对 {{lc|std::chrono::month_weekday}} 定义格式化规则。

通常不直接访问，但通过[[cpp/utility/format|格式化函数]]使用 {{lc|std::formatter}} 特化。

{{cpp/chrono/format spec begin}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/month}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/weekday}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec fail}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/year}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/day}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/date}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/time}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/count}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/zone}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec rows/others}}
{{cpp/chrono/format spec end}}
